projects.heading: Dystopia
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Completing this JavaScript End Of Module Project significantly enhanced my coding proficiency, as evidenced by my adeptness in crafting responsive navigation bars, dynamic product displays, and polished footers. Through mastering responsive design, user data handling, sorting, filtering, and CRUD system implementation, I have developed into a well-rounded coder capable of delivering comprehensive and user-friendly web experiences.

projects.heading: She Invests
projects.description: The capstone project, a Vue.js-based prediction market application, was developed using JavaScript, Express, MySQL, bcrypt, and hosted on Clever Cloud, featuring cookie-based user credential management and product cart storage, completed in three weeks with sessions or local storage for improved user experience. This hands-on experience, as a beginner, provided valuable insights into full-stack development, database management, and deploying applications on cloud platforms, significantly enhancing my skills.

projects.heading: Calculator
projects.description: Developing a basic calculator with JavaScript highlighted the significance of clean code and function utilization, fostering efficient code structuring for readability and maintainability. By decomposing calculator functionalities into distinct functions, I improved code organization and reusability, reinforcing the importance of modular coding practices and laying the foundation for scalable and maintainable JavaScript projects.

projects.heading: To-Do List
projects.text: A To-Do List to help you organize your life
projects.description: Developing a basic to-do list using JavaScript has been instrumental in honing fundamental coding skills, particularly in DOM manipulation for dynamic task management, thus bolstering my understanding of frontend development. Through implementing event listeners for user interactions and integrating local storage for data persistence, I've gained valuable insights into handling user input and managing data effectively, solidifying my JavaScript foundation and preparing me for more advanced coding endeavors.

projects.heading: First Portfolio
projects.text: Built with Bootstrap and basic HTML & JavaScript
projects.description: Developing my inaugural portfolio website with Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS, while refining design and UI/UX skills via Canva, was a pivotal learning journey. This project provided insights into crafting visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces, where leveraging Bootstrap facilitated a streamlined development process and integrating Canva-designed elements enhanced the overall aesthetic, emphasizing the importance of aligning code and design for a polished and engaging website, marking a notable advancement in my coding and design proficiency.

projects.heading: Keyboard
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Developing my keyboard using HTML and CSS as a student honed my frontend development skills, focusing on structuring and styling elements for visually appealing interfaces. This hands-on project not only deepened my understanding of HTML and CSS but also reinforced responsive design principles, serving as a foundational experience for more advanced web development concepts.

resume.heading: Soft Skills
resume.skill: Problem Solver, Listening & Communication Skills, Updated on Industry Trends, Team Player and Analytical Skills

resume.heading: Technical Skills
resume.skill: HTML-5, Javascript & CSS, Digital Marketing, UI/UX, Github & Git, Figma, Bootstrap Framework, Vue.js Framework and Web Design

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Matthew Brown - Lecturer
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is a hardworking and dedicated individual. Her attitude shows through her dedication and creativity. She is an amazing team player and always shows consistency

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Candice Amon - Manager
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson is an individual who shows up earlier than asked, works hard, and carries herself in a polite, respectable manner. Tyhiesha always presents herself with levelheadedness and grace. She always takes time to spend with other students when they do not understand topics in class.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Natasha George - Manager
testimonial.message: Ty consistently delivers outstanding results with detailed, refined, and high-quality work that exceeds expectations. We highly recommend working with Ty and look forward to future collaborations.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Seth Tobias - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson's genuine personality creates an inviting atmosphere, fostering open communication. Her commitment to improvement reflects high standards and unwavering determination, showcasing excellence in all she does. Tyhiesha's ability to understand diverse perspectives highlights her exceptional qualities as an individual.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials

testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson has good leadership skills. She is dedicated and committed to her work. Being acquainted with her made me realize that hard work always pays off and what you put in is what you get out.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Shaheem Salie - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is an exceptionally determined and hardworking individual. Her unwavering commitment to tasks and her impressive ability to overcome challenges is truly remarkable.
